Q.1.   Direction (1-5) : The xyz Ltd. Company has organised an exhibition of machine tools. The exhibition was open for people during all days. The visitors were given the entry passes having certain signs. The signs of entry passes were being changed after every hour. The rules followed to change the signs are shown below. The first batch could enter at 9.00 am & the last batch could enter at 7.00 pm. The lunch hour during the exhibition for all batches was 1.00 pm  2.00 pm.
